title: Le Tourment Serif ID Please
content:
What is the typeface used for Le Tourment?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215100459/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_343.png) | 153.29 KB |
author: hijinx

comments.content:
I'm fairly sure this is [Latin CT](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215100459/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/latin-ct/), the same typeface used on playbills. (someone correct me if I'm wrong?)

EDIT: That is similar, but the R is definitely off.
